an1.333-377:333.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1.333-377:333.1.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ;
an1.333-377:333.1.3: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye thalajā, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye odakā.
an1.333-377:334.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:334.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:334.2.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:334.2.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāyanti aviññātāresu milakkhesu.
an1.333-377:335.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye paññavanto ajaḷā aneḷamūgā paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ;
an1.333-377:335.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye duppaññā jaḷā eḷamūgā na paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an1.333-377:336.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye ariyena paññācakkhunā samannāgatā;
an1.333-377:336.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye avijjāgatā sammūḷhā.
an1.333-377:337.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya;
an1.333-377:337.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya.
an1.333-377:338.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya;
an1.333-377:338.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye na labhanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ savanāya.
an1.333-377:339.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye sutvā dhammaṃ dhārenti;
an1.333-377:339.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye sutvā dhammaṃ na dhārenti.
an1.333-377:340.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhanti;
an1.333-377:340.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ na upaparikkhanti.
an1.333-377:341.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjanti;
an1.333-377:341.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ na paṭipajjanti.
an1.333-377:342.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu saṃvijjanti;
an1.333-377:342.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃvejaniyesu ṭhānesu na saṃvijjanti.
an1.333-377:343.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye saṃviggā yoniso padahanti;
an1.333-377:343.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye saṃviggā yoniso na padahanti.
an1.333-377:344.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā labhanti samādhiṃ labhanti cittassekaggataṃ;
an1.333-377:344.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye vavassaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā na labhanti samādhiṃ na labhanti cittassekaggataṃ.
an1.333-377:345.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ lābhino;
an1.333-377:345.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye annaggarasaggānaṃ na lābhino, uñchena kapālābhatena yāpenti.
an1.333-377:346.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa lābhino;
an1.333-377:346.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa na lābhino.
an1.333-377:347.1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ imasmiṃ jambudīpe ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṃ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṃ pokkharaṇirāmaṇeyyakaṃ;
an1.333-377:347.1.2: atha kho etadeva bahutaraṃ yadidaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ nadīviduggaṃ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatavisamaṃ.
an1.333-377:347.1.3: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti, atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … pe … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pe … pettivisaye paccājāyanti”.
an1.333-377:350.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:350.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye manussā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:353.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:353.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:356.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:356.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:359.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:359.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:362.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye nirayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:362.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye nirayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:365.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:365.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:368.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:368.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye tiracchānayoniyā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:371.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā manussesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:371.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyanti.
an1.333-377:374.1.1: … Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
an1.333-377:374.1.2: atha kho eteva sattā bahutarā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pettivisaye paccājāyan”ti.
